name: Omnibot: Analytics Slackbot
description:
Created a Slackbot that fetches real-time, on-demand metrics from our analytics backend.

Created for a 24-hour hackathon.

assets.title: Omnibot (2016): A Slackbot that fetches real-time, on-demand metrics from our analytics backend.

name: Spread - Google Chrome Extension
description:
Built a Google Chrome extension for that replaces the user's Start Page with trending news and full screen images from CBS Interactive sites, such as CBS News and CNET.

Created for a 24-hour hackathon.

assets.title: Spread (2015): A Google Chrome extension for that replaces the user's Start Page with trending news and full screen images.

name: Podcaps: Searchable Podcasts
description: Created a searchable transcript database for the 'Welcome to Nightvale' podcast. Text is programatically timed to streaming audio, so you can read along and search across entire podcast episodes.

assets.title: Podcaps (2015): A searchable transcript database for the 'Welcome to Nightvale' podcast. Text is programatically timed to streaming audio, so you can read along and search across entire podcast episodes.

Podcaps (2015): A searchable transcript database for the 'Welcome to Nightvale' podcast. Text is programatically timed to streaming audio, so you can read along and search across entire podcast episodes.

name: n-degrees
description:
Built a tool to calculate distance (degrees of separation) between two news articles based on their embedded links, using Dijkstra's algorithm.

Created for a 24-hour hackathon.

assets.title: n-degrees (2014): A tool to calculate distance (degrees of separation) between two news articles based on their embedded links, using Dijkstra's algorithm.
